name: booking-and-referral
description: OAS (Swagger v3) API Definition for Template API

scripts.publish: mkdir -p build && ./node_modules/.bin/openapi-generator-cli generate -i specification/booking-and-referral.yaml | poetry run python scripts/yaml2json.py | poetry run python scripts/set_version.py > build/booking-and-referral.json

author: NHS Digital
